about_the_game:
Overview


RangBi is an immersive strategy rogue-like auto-battler where every decision shapes your destiny. In this world, you will:

  • Humble Beginning: Begin your journey with one of nine unique starting characters, each with distinct abilities and playstyles.
  • Navigate a Dynamic Dungeon: Ascend through a node-based dungeon, crafting your own build as you progress.
  • Face Formidable Bosses: Confront powerful bosses that challenge your strategy and foresight.
  • Embrace the Challenge: Die, learn, and adapt in a world where every encounter is perilous.

Create Your Own Squad


Assemble a team by selecting your starting hero and recruiting three additional characters on your journey. With nine distinct classes, you’ll need to balance damage, defense, and support to overcome the darkness that lies ahead.

Upgrade, Choose, and Customize



  • Upgrade Your Squad: Enhance your characters by leveling up the skills that best suit each encounter.
  • Tailor Your Build: Choose from a vast array of traits and items to customize each hero to your liking.
  • Unlock True Potential: Complete character-specific quests to unleash the full power of your heroes.

Battle Against Great Evils


At the end of each chapter, a formidable boss awaits, ready to test your strategic prowess and skill. Defeat these enemies to prove your worth and progress further.

name: RangBi

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.5 GHz / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1050 / AMD RX550
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 2.8 GHz / AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1080 / AMD RX 5600
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

short_description: RangBi is a strategy rogue-lite auto-battler with emphasis on building your own dungeon raiding team. Navigate the node-based dungeon to recruit and upgrade your team.With a bit of luck. the most cunning and brilliant can reach peer at the abyss below.
